5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa’eed said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘Whoever sleeps and misses Witr, or forgets it, let him pray it when morning comes, or when he remembers.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَامَ عَنْ وِتْرٍ، أَوْ نَسِيَهُ
chapter.eng-name: One who sleeps and misses Witr, or forgets it
